title: 66. AITC: Probiotic Architecture with Dr. Rachel Armstrong
itunes:title: 66. AITC: Probiotic Architecture with Rachel Armstrong
description: What is Living Architecture? What are alternative modes of being and building in the world? What are the implications of the Coronavirus as a living system and how might that impact what architecture might be?
content:encoded: What is Living Architecture? What are alternative modes of being and building in the world? What are the implications of the Coronavirus as a living system and how might that impact what architecture might be?
